alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 19 at 3:31AM HST until February 19 at 12:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING UNTIL NOON HST TODAY FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS... .A deep layer of moisture will continue to stream over the Big Island through Monday. Temperatures at summit level will remain near or below freezing and a mix of heavy snow and freezing rain will persist through at least noon today. Travel to the summits is extremely dangerous and life threatening with snow and ice covered roadways. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON HST TODAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of two to four inches and light ice accumulations. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Until noon HST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet, and ice are expected or occurring. Strong winds are also possible. This will make travel very hazardous or impossible. Any travel plans to the summits should be postponed until the threat diminishes.
